CLAIRE TAUZIET

PRODUCT DESIGNER

For the last 3 years, I've been working as a Product Designer in San Francisco. I'm currently working at Google and previously worked at BigCommerce and Fliptop (acquired by LinkedIn). I love every aspects of designing products, from identifying problems to prototyping solutions: wireframing, designing mockups, building prototypes, shipping and iterating.
